actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to restrict the transportation of radioactive materials through large cities.
short_title: Radioactive Materials Transportation Safety Act of 1985

summary.text: Radioactive Materials Transportation Safety Act of 1985 - Amends the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act of 1975 to prohibit the transportation of any controlled quantity of radioactive materials by public road or highway through or into a city with a population of 50,000 or more. Exempts from such proscription radioactive materials that are to be used: (1) for medical purposes in the affected city; or (2) during a national emergency.

titles.title: Radioactive Materials Transportation Safety Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to restrict the transportation of radioactive materials through large cities.
